identity.mission: Create a 'Tactical Command' interface that feels like a military HUD but functions like a top-tier SaaS product. Avoid generic 'gamer' tropes; aim for 'professional strategist'.
principles: Fusion: Military Precision x Modern SaaS Utility
Content is King: Data density with breathing room
Zoom In: Focus on the applicant's details
Negative Space: Use dark voids to frame content

theme.name: Tactical Command
theme.description: A high-contrast, dark-mode interface inspired by military strategy games and command centers. Uses deep slate backgrounds with sharp amber and emerald accents.

headings.usage: All section titles, page headers, and key metrics. If Rajdhani is unavailable, use 'Chakra Petch' or 'JetBrains Mono'.

body.usage: General text, form labels, table data.

mono.usage: IDs, timestamps, code snippets, status codes.

primary.description: Tactical Amber - Used for primary actions (Apply, Login, Submit).

secondary.description: Radar Green - Used for success states, 'Approved' status, and safe actions.

destructive.description: Alert Red - Used for 'Reject', 'Ban', and critical errors.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-sm font-bold uppercase tracking-wide shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(245,158,11,0.2)] transition-all hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(245,158,11,0.4)]
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary/20 text-secondary hover:bg-secondary/30 border border-secondary/50 rounded-sm uppercase tracking-wide

cards.base: bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-border/50 rounded-lg shadow-xl

inputs.base: bg-background/50 border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-sm placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

badges.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

landing_page.structure: Hero Section (Full Height) -> Mission Brief (About) -> Call to Action

application_form.animation: Slide-in from right for new questions.

dashboard.structure: Sidebar (Nav) -> Top Bar (Search/Filter) -> Main Content (Data Grid)
dashboard.density: High density for data, but with p-6 padding inside containers.

hero_background.description: Aerial city view at night - use with heavy CSS overlay (opacity 0.2, grayscale) to create a tactical map background.

tactical_map.description: Miniature soldiers/map - use for 'About' or 'Mission' section visuals.

tech_overlay.description: Abstract metal structure - use for card backgrounds or section dividers.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA. Use 'text-slate-200' on dark backgrounds, not 'text-gray-500'.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings (Amber-500) on all interactive elements.
accessibility.labels: All inputs must have visible labels or aria-labels.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a 'Tactical Command' interface. It should feel like a tool used by elite moderators. Keep it dark, sharp, and responsive.
instructions_to_main_agent.setup: Install 'lucide-react' for icons. Use 'clsx' and 'tailwind-merge' for class management.
instructions_to_main_agent.critical: Do NOT use gradients for text. Do NOT use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl (keep it sharp/rounded-sm or rounded-md). Do NOT use 'blue' as the primary color (use Amber).
instructions_to_main_agent.files: Create components in /app/frontend/src/components/ui. Create pages in /app/frontend/src/pages.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
